pages.title: Netherite Door
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Door by default can be accesible to anyone.$(br)$(li)As $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/lock_block)Lock Blocks$(/l), they can be locked with a $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l).
